result.execSummary:
The defendant Curtis T Oglesby was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)1.
  • Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant IS eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program and the Substance Abuse Program.  Sentence credit for 125 days were granted.
Concurrent with: Count 3.

superMiscConds.notes:
Costs to be paid as a condition of Extended Supervision.  Apply any funds that are being held by the State.
DNA Surcharge WAIVED.

Submit to an AODA assessment, follow through with any treatment recomended.  No use or possession of illegal drugs/drug paraphernalia. Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
  If Probation/Extended Supervision is revoked and/or a prison term ordered, outstanding financial obligations shall be collected pursuant to statutory provisions, including deductions from inmate prison monies.  If discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collections may include income assignment.

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Curtis T Oglesby in court, in custody, with attorney J Anthony Rosario.   Andrea M Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads guilty to counts #1 and 3, penalty enhancers dismissed.  Court finds the defendant guilty of counts #1 and 3 with the penalty enhancers dismissed.  Count #2 is dismissed and read in.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Rosario makes statements.  Defendant makes statements. 

The Court Orders the Following:  Count 1 
Sentence of:
36 months Imprisonment (Credit - 125 days ) Concurrent to count #3.  
18 months of Initial Confinement
18 months of Extended Supervision
Conditions of extended supervision:
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
Absolute Sobriety; Random U.A.s;
No Use or Possession of illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia;
COSTS:  $268.00 to be paid as a condition of extended supervision, apply any funds that are being held by the State. 
DNA Surcharge: waived. 
DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 
Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program
Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program
Felony warnings, immigration warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.  

The Court Orders the Following:  Count 3 
Sentence of:
36 months Imprisonment (Credit - 125 days ) Concurrent to count #1.  
18 months of Initial Confinement
18 months of Extended Supervision
Conditions of extended supervision:
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
